alert.note: Alert for Johnson County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 3:53PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Johnson County through 415 PM CDT... At 352 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodland, or 5 miles north of Clarksville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarksville... Lamar... Hillcrest in Johnson County... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Johnson County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County
